channel.title: I need help with auto closing client, need fixed now
channel.description: ok so i downloaded a source/client to start a server but when i opened it and clicked the screen it logs me out how do i stop it from doing this?

item.title: I need help with auto closing client, need fixed now

item.description:

you mean your client is closeing or it is logging you out ? â€¦ if its your client closeing its probably because your running 64.bit windows it sometimes happens google it i think you can get some kind fo softwere to stop it or just try and find a 64bit client for your server , or make a run that will run on 64.bit. :L
